programme.title: Walk of Art: Walk of Art: Doha's Cultural Landscape
programme.desc: We explore how art has influenced the cultural landscape of Qatar and how it can be an immersive experience for those who visit, live and work there. programme.title: Accused S2
programme.desc: Based on the BBC's BAFTA-winning crime anthology, Accused opens in a courtroom on the accused, with viewers knowing nothing about their crime or how they ended up on trial. Told from the defendant's point of view through flashbacks, this series holds a mirror up to the current times with evocative and emotional stories. In Accused, viewers discover how an ordinary person gets caught up in an extraordinary situation, ultimately revealing how one wrong turn leads to another, until it's too late to turn back.

programme.desc: James Dainard and his team try to make the grade when they partner with Bre, a college professor and aspiring flipper, to revive a rundown farmhouse in his old neighbourhood.

programme.title: Love At First Sight
programme.desc: Three childhood friends discover their worth and inner strengths, as they experience love and being loved.

Opposites attract and they were all faced with the difficulty of adjusting to the differences in their personalities.

programme.title: I Love You Sabado
programme.desc: Heaven makes mistakes too. Janno was killed before his time and must be sent back to earth. However, the Chief Angel found out that he was due to die in one week's time, or next Saturday or Sabado and he would go to hell.

programme.title: Jesus Calderon (Maton)
programme.desc: This is another take-off on the eternal poor boy loves rich girl tale. Love wins out in the end but only after Jesus Calderon has proven himself, and the lovely damsel in distress has learned to love and trust him with all her heart.

programme.title: Sinasamba Kita (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Lorna, the illegitimate daughter of a business tycoon was left in the care of her half-sister, Vilma, upon the death of their father. Though she took care of all her material needs, she refused to show the girl any kind of affection.

programme.title: Sagad Hanggang Buto
programme.desc: When his parents are killed by assassins in the family car, Banjo is adopted by the thief who took his dead parents' wallet. Raised in poverty and used to surviving with his wits, he grows up as the town's resident hoodlum.

programme.title: Where 'D' Girls 'R'
programme.desc: Rapper-comedian Andrew E and the kids from the hit TV series TGIS combined together in this merry mix-up about poor boys falling in love with rich girls, who were guarded by a very strict maiden aunt.

programme.title: Ober Da Bakod The Movie
programme.desc: The movie version of the popular TV sitcom, Ober De Bakod. This is a story of two families, always in competition -- they are actually neighbors. In this movie, the parents continue to fight and outdo each other, while the children continue their love affairs with each other. However, this time, they all go on holiday -- separately of course. It does not start well, as they all ended up in an island where they meet the natives and have problems with the bad guys.

programme.title: Collateral Damage
programme.desc: Firefighter Gordon Brewer, is done putting out fires and ready to start one of his own. When his wife and child are horrifically killed in an international terrorist bombing -- linked to Claudio "The Wolf" Perrini -- the CIA and FBI offer no answers and no response. With the official investigation going nowhere, and haunted by the thought of his family's killer walking away scot-free, Gordon swears revenge, even if it takes him to Colombia.

programme.title: Jack The Giant Slayer
programme.desc: Bryan Singer supersizes the "Jack and the Beanstalk" legend in this epic action twist on a classic tale, starring Nicholas Hoult, Stanley Tucci, Bill Nighy, Ewan McGregor, Ian McShane and more. When a young farmhand unwittingly opens a gateway between our world and a fearsome race of giants, an ancient war is reignited. Unleashed upon the Earth, the marauding giants strive to reclaim the land they once lost, forcing Jack into the battle of his life to stop them. Fighting for a kingdom and its people -- and the love of a princess, of course -- he comes face to face with the legendary goliaths and, in the process, become a legend himself.

programme.desc: The Observers on France 24 is a weekly show produced with photos, videos and personal accounts from Observers around the world. The Observers are volunteers, and are not paid for their contributions.

programme.title: Common Cause - The Eye Doctor - Vietnam
programme.desc: In his final years, Australian eye surgeon Fred Hollows trained Vietnamese doctors in modern cataract surgery. Decades on, they and their students continue his mission, restoring sight to those who might otherwise go without.

programme.title: The Way We Wore - Episode 1
programme.desc: Celeste Barber traces the evolution of fashion media from early silent cinema ads through magazines to influencers, interrogating how the media and advertising industries have been harnessed to sell fashion over the decades.

programme.title: Belonging(s) - Fashion: From Samfu To The Koala Jumpers
programme.desc: Through a blue silk robe, we explore how early Chinese migrants negotiated a new identity in Australia. We also see how these fashion choices have been redefined by designer Jenny Kee and her famous koala jumper.

programme.title: ABC National News - Episode 38
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you today's top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Whisper of Silent Body
programme.desc: Renowned as the "corpse whisperer," forensic pathologist Qin Ming uncovers vital clues from the corpses. During a homicide investigation, he unravels a murder case sixteen years ago in the snowy mountain with his assistant and a detective. Together, they unveil the secrets of the mysterious homicide.

programme.title: Dead in the Water
programme.desc: When aspiring photography vlogger Tara gets dumped by her long term boyfriend, her best friend Amy takes her on a weekend getaway to her family's vacation lake house. It is there that they encounter a mysterious and charming man who forces them to face their demons.

programme.title: Sa Haba Ng Gabi
programme.desc: Two housemaids and a driver take shelter at their employer's mansion when a zombie outbreak happens one night. Can they all survive the night?

programme.title: The Case of Disappearances
programme.desc: In Misty Village, the adopted son Wen Jie is haunted by a recurring nightmare. He delves into a series of disappearance cases in the village to seek his true identity. As more villagers die mysteriously, belief in the curse of Emperor Jing Lung intensifies. Wen Jie teams up with the security chief to unveil the conspiracy and protect the villagers.

programme.title: Bahay Na Pula
programme.desc: Jane and her husband Marco go to the ancestral house that Jane inherited from her grandmother. As they move into the house, Jane starts to experience horrifying events and her belly mysteriously grows bigger every day, as if she has gotten pregnant all of a sudden‚Ä¶

programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) moves into a new neighbourhood where everyone‚Äôs life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: Detective Dee: The Ghosts in Weird Town
programme.desc: Detective Dee investigates a series of terrifying vampire transformations in Youming Town, uncovering a sinister conspiracy masterminded by Prince Li Zhen, who plots to overthrow the empire. Armed with courage and ingenuity, Dee defeats the bloodthirsty vampires and ultimately exposes the prince‚Äôs dark ambitions.

programme.title: WIFI
programme.desc: Li Hong Shan‚Äôs wife died in a car accident. One year later, he suddenly receives a message from his dead wife. Li vows to save his wife's life through this time transcending WIFI signal, but ends up uncovering a bigger conspiracy behind‚Ä¶

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A high school cheerleader, Ashley, is adopted by the killers who murdered her parents. She is horrified to find out the truth during a home robbery years later, and must choose to either escape or be part of this family for good.

programme.title: Rooftop
programme.desc: A group of friends invites Paul to a secret party on their campus rooftop. When a prank accidentally kills Paul, the friends cover up the incident and promised never to disclose it. Paul vows to take revenge by becoming a vicious ghost to haunt them into taking responsibility for their actions.

programme.title: Deep in the Sea
programme.desc: Suspended psychiatrist Huang is asked to treat Zhao who suffers from schizophrenia. Zhao can only release himself from the pain of his girlfriend's death by killing people in his delusion. During the treatment, Huang is gradually affected by Zhao. He soon finds the way to cure Zhao, but then discovers an important secret about himself.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: DNA Speaks
programme.desc: When Linda Slaten is brutally strangled in her Lakeland, FL, home, a web of suspects emerges. The case takes a dramatic turn when a DNA hit exposes the sinister underbelly of this peaceful community.

programme.title: Murder At The Motel
programme.desc: Local police receive a distressing 911 call from 32-year-old Brian Redding. He is heard crying and screaming that he has found his 16-year-old girlfriend dead in their room.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Murder In The Bayou
programme.desc: When Betty Jones, 65, and Kathryn Crigler, 81, are brutally attacked in a 1990 home invasion, the tiny community of Starkville, MS, is left living in fear.

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: Undercover agents Lyle Kirian and Brian Townsend embed themselves in two different but equally dangerous worlds in order to investigate suspected local gang members and the Mexican cartel.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: In 2006, Ken Juedes was found dead by his wife, Cindy Shulz-Juedes. For 13 years the case went cold until investigators linked her to the murder.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: Black Girl Missing
programme.desc: Companion piece to the movie Black Girl Missing. While the media goes into a frenzy over missing white girls, Black women's disappearances receive muted coverage and limited police resources.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A family faces off with violent attackers trying to rob their jewelry store; two young women flee from a driver out to get them on a terrifying road trip; convenience and crime collide at a bank ATM.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A man brutally attacks multiple people during an auto store robbery. A woman with an unusual weapon fends off an alleged serial thief. A woman is carjacked by a wanted fugitive and more.

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6)
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Aaron Campbell didn't admit his crimes until after his conviction. He abducted six-year-old neighbour Alesha MacPhailand, carried her to a nearby wood, and raped and murdered her.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: In Epping, New Hampshire, Sheila LaBarre was known as an eccentric widow who loved her rabbits. But her turbulent childhood, a coma-induced vision, and her husband's death sent Sheila on a mission to kill.

programme.title: Murder In The 21st
programme.desc: Police are hard-pressed to find solid leads when a 19-year-old girl vanishes without a trace.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1)
programme.desc: A man is arrested for driving his golf cart while intoxicated and refuses a breathalyser test. A young man with LSD and hashish learns the hard way that hanging with underage girls is a very bad idea.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: Arthur Shawcross tells a lot of stories about his life before he began to kill. He might have been known for killing women along Rochester's Genesee River, but his first murder was years earlier.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A grieving uncle screams at his sister-in-law in court over his missing nephew; an autoworker checks in to his virtual hearing from the assembly line; a road rage killer blames his victim; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A grieving father attacks his 3-year-old son's killer in court; a judge screams expletives at a disruptive member of the gallery; a wheelchair-ridden defendant runs for it before entering court; and more.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S15)
programme.desc: Tulsa detectives believe the victim of a shooting was a Good Samaritan who'd been robbed. But at trial, the jury must decide if his killer actually acted in fear of his own life.

programme.title: City Confidential (S9)
programme.desc: The quiet suburb of Haddon Township is turned upside down when a toddler goes missing. Residents band together to search local streets and help detectives reveal an unlikely murderer.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: An argument between former NFL player Travis Rudolph and his ex-girlfriend escalates into a gunfight with her brother and his friends.

programme.title: The First 48 (S24)
programme.desc: In Tulsa, a young mother is gunned down at a convenience store by a shotgun-toting assailant. In Kansas City, a local businessman is executed and Detective Jason Sutton looks to his employees for a motive.

programme.desc: When beautiful Jalajhia Finklea vanished the day before her 18th birthday, her Wampanoag Tribe members immediately took action.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: Know more about fractions 1‚ÅÑ2 and 1/4, 2-dimensional and 3-dimensional figures, as well as continuous and repeating patterns and mathematical sentences.

programme.title: Grade 1 Reading & Literacy
programme.desc: Learn about polite expressions and how to talk about oneself, one‚Äôs family and one‚Äôs personal experiences.

programme.title: Grade 1 Makabansa
programme.desc: Unawain ang kahalagahan ng pagkilala ng mga batayang impormasyon ng pisikal na kapaligiran sa sariling paaralan at ng mga taong bumubuo rito para sa paghubog ng kakayahan ng bawat mag-aaral.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Matuto tungkol sa pangngalan, panghalip, salitang magkatugma, salitang naglalarawan, at pagbabaybay, pati na rin ang iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento at ang pag-uugnay ng sarili sa tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: Study how to divide whole numbers up to 1000 including money and unit fractions. Learn more about straight and curved lines, flat and curved surfaces, and basic shapes and continuous patterns using two attributes.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: Discover what are word clines, synonyms, and antonyms. Identify major points and key themes in a story, and the difference between what is made-up and real in texts.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Alamin ang kahalagahan ng mabuting paglilingkod ng mga namumuno sa pagsulong ng mga pangunahing hanapbuhay at pagtugon sa pangangailangan ng mga kasapi ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Pag-aralan ang tambalang salita, pandiwa, pang-abay, at pang-ukol. Alamin kung paano magbigay ng sariling ideya, hinuha, pangunahin at sumusuportang kaisipan, tungkol sa kuwentong napakinggan.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: Identify which fractions are proper and improper, similar and dissimilar and equivalent. Learn more about lines and symmetrical designs, continuous and repeating patterns, and mathematical sentences involving multiplication and division of whole numbers.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: Study what are homonyms, homographs, and hyponyms. Know more about the elements of a story, how to write it, and how to compare and contrast its information, alongside learning about words, phrases, and sentences with long vowels.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Unawain at pahalagahan ang pagkakakilanlang kultural ng kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: Discover how objects perform motion, and learn about the source of light, sound, heat and electricity, along with their uses.

programme.title: Grade 6 Filipino
programme.desc: Matuto tungkol sa wastong paggamit ng pang-angkop, pangatnig, salitang may lapi, at iba't ibang uri ng pangungusap. Alamin kung paano magbigay ng lagom, pagsusuri ng pahayag, at kumuha ng impormasyon sa tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 6 Math
programme.desc: Understand the nature of solid figures, sequences in forming rules, expressions and equations. Learn more about rate and speed, and of area and surface area of plane and solid or space figures.

programme.title: Grade 6 English
programme.desc: Know how to present reports of differing viewpoints and how to evaluate narratives.

programme.title: Grade 6 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Alamin kung paano unawain at pahalagahan ang pagpupunyagi ng mga Pilipino tungo sa pagtugon sa mga suliranin, isyu at hamon ng kasarinlan.

programme.title: Grade 6 Science
programme.desc: Learn more about gravity, friction and how they affect movement of objects, alongside how energy is transformed in simple machines.

programme.title: Grade 8 Filipino
programme.desc: Alamin kung paano magsuri at maghambing ng iba't ibang uri ng panitikan, kung ano ang mga estratehiya sa pagkuha ng impormasyon, paano wastong gamitin ang impormal na komunikasyon, at ang angkop na ekspresyon sa pagbabahagi ng ideya o opinyon tungkol sa mga tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 8 Math
programme.desc: Identify the key concepts of axiomatic structure of geometry and triangle congruence.

programme.title: Grade 8 English
programme.desc: Examine what are biases, propagandas, parallelism, and cohesive devices in different types of speech.

programme.title: Grade 8 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Aralin ang naging transpormasyon tungo sa makabagong panahon ng mga bansa at rehiyon sa daigdig bunsod ng paglaganap ng mga kaisipan sa agham, politika, at ekonomiya tungo sa pagbuo ng pandaigdigan kamalayan.

programme.title: Grade 8 Science
programme.desc: Learn more about the particle nature of matter as a basis for explaining properties, physical changes, and structure of substances and mixtures. Discover how to identify a substance according to its atomic structure, and how to use the periodic table of elements to organize and determine the chemical properties of elements.

programme.title: Preschool | Eccd

programme.title: Kindergarten

programme.title: Grade 1 Language

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: Know more about fractions 1‚ÅÑ2 and 1/4, 2-dimensional and 3-dimensional figures, as well as continuous and repeating patterns and mathematical sentences.

programme.title: Grade 1 Reading & Literacy

programme.title: Grade 1 Makabansa

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Matuto tungkol sa pangngalan, panghalip, salitang magkatugma, salitang naglalarawan, at pagbabaybay, pati na rin ang iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento at ang pag-uugnay ng sarili sa tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Les 3 Mousquetaires
programme.desc: Charlotte, Olivia, Ines and Isa lead a double life: ordinary girls at court, training in secret to be the best fighters in the kingdom. The 3 Musketeers, that's them! Bound by an unbreakable friendship, they foil plots and protect the king from his enemies.

programme.title: Les 3 Mousquetaires
programme.desc: Charlotte, Olivia, Ines and Isa lead a double life: ordinary girls at court, training in secret to be the best fighters in the kingdom. The 3 Musketeers, that's them! Bound by an unbreakable friendship, they foil plots and protect the king from his enemies.

programme.title: Les Triples
programme.desc: The triplets may look like angels, but they're not the last to get up to mischief... The two brothers and the sister are inseparable and as loving as they are mischievous. The adults need to be brave to channel their energy!

programme.title: Le Refuge D'Audrey
programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: L'Aventure Du Monde Des Mondes
programme.desc: Dimitri, Raph's and Ana√Øs's uncle, is a French globetrotter who is fascinated by nature. He gives them tasks to stimulate their creativity. Thanks to Blox, a small robot, they access the ''world of the worlds'', a secret fantasy place where they can play and learn.

programme.title: Kassa Le Messager
programme.desc: At his grandfather's request, Kassa heads off on a mission to discover the culture and history of thirteen African countries.

programme.title: Mission Info
programme.desc: News programme aimed at 7 to 11-year-olds! Each episode, devised for children and their parents, provides insight accessible to younger ones, combined with explanations, immersive reports and expert interviews. An educational quiz also gives children the chance to test their knowledge in a fun way.

programme.title: Ma Vie Avec L'Ia
programme.desc: Theo, a teenager, directly questions artificial intelligence in an attempt to better understand it. He seeks to know what constitutes it, what feeds it, and how it analyzes data.

programme.title: Carbone
programme.desc: Benoit Poiraudeau is fighting climate change by planting trees, but without asking for permission. He's a clandestine planter.

programme.title: Falo
programme.desc: A news magazine show, ''Falo'' discusses and analyses current affairs in depth.

programme.title: Objectif Monde L'Hebdo
programme.desc: Report, inquiry, investigation ... ''Objectif Monde L'Hebdo'', a television magazine by French-speaking editorialists, takes time to reflect and analyse through the expert insights and opinions provided by specialists. A TV5MONDE programme, jointly produced with RTS, in collaboration with its francophone partners (RTBF, Radio-Canada, France Televisions).

programme.title: Ding Dong : Montre-Moi Ta Maison !
programme.desc: In the canton of Basel-Landschaft, we visit the home of a couple of tattoo artists, a house covered in ivy and with a very stylish interior! The tour continues in a former school that has been converted into a home. The owner, Ursula, has turned her house into a sort of junk shop...

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the C√¥te d'Azur.

programme.title: Suisse En Scene
programme.desc: Interview with a key figure from the Swiss cultural scene. An opportunity to look back at their life and career, and the foundations that underpin their work.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Wedded by force in Kabylia, Dalila came to Paris very young, forced to follow her husband. Between violence and financial hardship, she found the strength to free herself and try her hand at a traditionally male profession: taxi driver. She explains her struggle to take her future in hand again.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match
programme.desc: A key figure from the world of sport looks back at a particular competition, a career, an outstanding moment.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada

programme.title: Papilles
programme.desc: He is part of the long list of Auvergnats who ''moved up to the capital.'' But chef David Rathgeber preferred the kitchens of great chefs to the bougnats' cellars. Under Alain Ducasse's guidance, he followed his star, and now delights Parisian palates.

programme.title: Hep Taxi !
programme.desc: In town or in the countryside, day or night, Jer√¥me Colin, the presenter-taxi driver leads his prestigious customer on a four-wheel journey conducive to secrets.

programme.title: Dans Les Bottes De Lucky Luke
programme.desc: For the naive reader, the Far-West is a plain, the sky, a horse and a cowboy. Lucky Luke is himself alone the symbol of this legendary character, a mythical horseman, driving forward immense herds of cattle, alone in boundless nature. Jul follows in his footsteps.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: Sustainable development, eco-friendly, up-cycling: a whole new vocabulary that represents the way the world is changing. We take a look at how it's affecting the worlds of fashion (Akho, Bleu.M, North Hill), beauty (Savonnerie du Midi, Ormaie Paris) and design (Mona Oren, Au Passeur de Lumiere).

programme.title: Version Francaise
programme.desc: In Bordeaux, the Musee des Douanes shines a spotlight on one of France's oldest institutions. Interview with Arnaud Faye, head of the Bristol restaurants. For the Diesel show, Glenn Martens transformed the catwalk into a graffiti area. Sheathing and gilding: the Bettenfeld-Rosenblum workshop has been working with leather since 1895.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Refuges De Montagne - Hiver
programme.desc: In Berne, Simon is in charge of the Suppenalp mountain hut. In Valais, Christina and Joel spend their first season in Hollandia. In the Grisons, Silvana, Nicola and their dog Lynn are opening Es-Cha overlooking the Engadine. If the snow does not fall quickly, the season risks being short.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2

programme.title: Copperman
programme.desc: Anselmo, an adult with the mental age of a child, fights evil and the criminals who threaten his country as Copperman, thanks to the special armor given to him by the local blacksmith.

programme.title: Run Woman Run

programme.title: Latin For All
programme.desc: Delphine, a disillusioned Latin teacher, made a deal with her class of 5 lazy students: if they keep quiet, they‚Äôll all receive A grades without having to learn anything. Unfortunately, this qualifies them for a Latin competition taking place in Naples.

programme.title: Masha

programme.title: Milk Teeth
programme.desc: Living in a small rural community, Skalde navigates societal stigma due to having an„ÄÄ‚Äúoutsider‚Äù„ÄÄmother. When she befriends a mysterious girl in the woods, Skalde jeopardizes everything,„ÄÄstruggling to balance loyalty to her community and her newfound bond.

programme.title: Summer Rebels
programme.desc: Young Jonas wants to visit his cool grandpa in Slovakia for a summer of fun, but his mom has other plans. Undeterred, Jonas takes off on an adventure of his own in this luminous and light-hearted tale of rebellion, friendship, catastrophe and redemption.

programme.title: Falling Into Place
programme.desc: Kira and Ian meet all too briefly over a winter weekend on the Isle of Skye and form a sudden and deep bond. Back in London, they try to move on with their separate lives - but both have to stop running from themselves before they are ready to meet again.

programme.title: Through Rocks and Clouds
programme.desc: 8-year-old alpaca herder Feliciano is ecstatic: Peru has a chance to qualify for the World Cup. However, the scheming of a mining company is jeopardizing his village.

programme.title: The Daval Mystery
programme.desc: Jonathann Daval reports the disappearance of his wife Alexia after she fails to return from her morning jog. Over the next three months, the police will launch the most relentless investigation into a media saga that will shake the whole of France.

programme.title: Murders on the Cote Sauvage
programme.desc: Amidst cocaine-laden shores, the discovery of Lagne's body plunges Captain Sarah into a web of intrigue. Together with drugs agent Ben, she navigates dark secrets and treacherous alliances to unveil the truth behind the murders haunting the C√¥te Sauvage.

programme.title: Copperman
programme.desc: Anselmo, an adult with the mental age of a child, fights evil and the criminals who threaten his country as Copperman, thanks to the special armor given to him by the local blacksmith.

programme.title: Sleepless Night
programme.desc: A cop with a connection to the criminal underworld finds his secret life exposed when he and his partner are caught stealing cocaine from a powerful drug dealer, a move that puts his son's life in jeopardy.

programme.title: Paralympian
programme.desc: Inspired by true stories. The one leg athlete sinks into a deep depression, until one day he is offered to try his luck at the Paralympic games.

programme.title: Bille

programme.title: Indonesia Authentic Places - EP 7
programme.desc: For most of the time, Indonesia is a magnet for most travelers and adventurers. With more than seventeen thousand islands scattered across over five million kilometers and three time zones that needs a lifetime to explore and appreciate its natural beauty. Same with its title, the program sums it all up into twenty-five must-visit authentic destinations that simply cannot be missed. From defining beaches to magical mountains and wild forests, be prepared to be amazed by authentic Indonesia.

programme.title: Ekspedisi Ekstrem - EP 4
programme.desc: Ekspedisi Ekstrem explores the human stories behind those living in unusual and extraordinary spaces. At the same time, Ekspedisi Ekstrem gives an intimate glimpse of the communities' unique dwellings and their ways to survive.

programme.title: Summer Rebels
programme.desc: Young Jonas wants to visit his cool grandpa in Slovakia for a summer of fun, but his mom has other plans. Undeterred, Jonas takes off on an adventure of his own in this luminous and light-hearted tale of rebellion, friendship, catastrophe and redemption.

programme.title: Through Rocks and Clouds
programme.desc: 8-year-old alpaca herder Feliciano is ecstatic: Peru has a chance to qualify for the World Cup. However, the scheming of a mining company is jeopardizing his village.

programme.title: Murders on the Cote Sauvage
programme.desc: Amidst cocaine-laden shores, the discovery of Lagne's body plunges Captain Sarah into a web of intrigue. Together with drugs agent Ben, she navigates dark secrets and treacherous alliances to unveil the truth behind the murders haunting the C√¥te Sauvage.

programme.title: Paralympian
programme.desc: Inspired by true stories. The one leg athlete sinks into a deep depression, until one day he is offered to try his luck at the Paralympic games.

programme.title: A Wedding
programme.desc: Zahira, eighteen years old, a Belgian-Pakistani girl wants to keep the baby growing inside her. Amir, her brother and confidant, promises to help her. But the parents have other ideas for the young girl.

programme.title: Bille
programme.desc: In late 1930s Latvia, young Bille grows up in poverty, caught between her mother‚Äôs contempt and her father‚Äôs alcoholism. Escaping into books and her imagination, she dreams of a better world as she embarks on her path to becoming a celebrated writer.

programme.title: Remember To Blink
programme.desc: Jacqueline adopts two children from a foreign country with her husband. To help with translation, the kids are accompanied by Gabriele, a twenty-year old who is just starting to taste the sweetness of feeling power.

programme.title: Sleepless Night
programme.desc: A cop with a connection to the criminal underworld finds his secret life exposed when he and his partner are caught stealing cocaine from a powerful drug dealer, a move that puts his son's life in jeopardy.

programme.title: Murder in Charente
programme.desc: When 38-year-old Cyril is found murdered on the grounds of a grand estate, pregnant detective Maud Arthuis teams up with private investigator Lucien Labeguerri. As secrets unravel and another murder occurs, the case becomes deeply personal for them both.

programme.title: I Want You
programme.desc: In this achingly melancholic sequel to Three Meters Above the Sky, Mario Casas is the soulful Hache, a man trying to forget his first love, Babi. When he meets Gin, he thinks he might love again. But a chance encounter with Babi shatters it all.

programme.title: Ann
programme.desc: The real-life story of Ann Lovett, a 15-year-old Irish girl who died in childbirth in a grotto of her local church in 1984. The film revisits a tragedy that shook the nation to its core.

programme.title: Phases
programme.desc: A teenage girl unexpectedly gets her period one afternoon. Panic sets in when she realizes that she has run out of sanitary pads. In the end, she is pushed to recognize her dependency on her mother through their shared experience of womanhood

programme.title: Winners
programme.desc: 11-year-old Mona, a Syrian refugee in Berlin, struggles to adapt to her new life. When she joins a competitive girls' football team, she faces the challenge of being an outsider. Soon she realizes the value of teamwork for success.

programme.title: Out Of The Blue
programme.desc: A successful and dashing young man whose life of one-night stands seems to be going great until a teenybopper, claiming to be his daughter, knocks on his door.
